posts.post_title: Wtt: T206 sgc 70 wild bill donovan portrait (sovereign 150)
posts.post_content: Looking to trade this card as i was just able to pick it up in a psa 7. This card is incredible and looks like a 7, nice centering as well. I honestly don't know what sgc saw because i can't find anything. I am open to trade offers on other t206s....scans available. Thanks
